definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: Today, a number of advanced collectives and individuals who have been named.
sentences.chinese: 一批先進集體和個人今天受到了命名錶彰。
